arStrings.szText: Salvaging {s1} gave you {s2}!

Salvage Results
Salvaging {s1} gave you
This action will irreversibly destroy all magic items in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
This action will irreversibly destroy all rare items in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
This action will irreversibly destroy all normal items in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
Salvage All
This action will irreversibly destroy one or more equipped items. Are you sure you want to do this?
Salvage
This action will irreversibly destroy all normal, magic, and rare items in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
This action will irreversibly destroy all scrap items in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
Are you sure you want to destroy {s1}?
This action will irreversibly destroy all items marked as junk in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
This action will irreversibly destroy all common Nightmare Sigils in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
This action will irreversibly destroy all sacred Nightmare Sigils in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
This action will irreversibly destroy all ancestral Nightmare Sigils in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
This action will irreversibly destroy all sacred and ancestral Nightmare Sigils in your inventory. Are you sure you want to do this?
